wblut.external.straightskeleton

Class LinearForm

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LinearForm
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Matrix form of a line Ax + Bx = c and all that jaz.
    Author:
    twak

      • intersectsP

        public double intersectsP(Point2d start,
                 Vector2d dir)
        Returns the paramater wrt a collision with a line of parameterized form
        Parameters:
        start - start location of paramaterized line
        dir - direction of paramaterized line
        Returns:
        the paramater wrt a collision with a line of parameterized form or null if no intersection

        public boolean sameOrientation(LinearForm o)
        Checks that the values A and B are approx the same in the given form.
        Returns:
        true if they are the same, else false

      • toLine

        public Line toLine(int start,
          int end)
        Strange code to create a line: start, end define the range on the chosen axis. The chosen axis is based to avoid /0 errors.
